attributes.action: follow the example of the Australian government and phase out the sale of incandescent light bulbs by 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the high efficiency of low-energy light bulbs, the banning of low efficient incandescent bulbs will reduce domestic and business electricity bills and have a positive effect on global warming.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
